PersonalStatement.text: Ms. John Medina, born on 28/07/1961 (56 years old), is a Female specializing in computational fluid dynamics and aerospace materials located in New Garrett, Donaldmouth. She is Widowed and a Harveystad citizen.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at AeroTech Dynamics from April 2012 to May 2017. Michael was instrumental in developing new composite materials for improved flight performance.
Data Scientist at SpaceInnovations, June 2017 to present. She leads projects focused on high-speed aircraft, based in Tokyo.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master of Science in Aerospace Engineering from MIT, 2007-2011. Thesis on 'Applications of nano-enhanced materials for aerospace use'.
PhD in Fluid Dynamics from Harvard University, 2012-2016, with a dissertation focusing on Applications of nano-enhanced materials for aerospace use.

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in numerical simulation and materials science. Her innovations have led to patents in lightweight materials for aerospace applications.
Leadership and Communication: Skilled in leading diverse teams and communicating complex technical information effectively.

Hobbies.text: In she free time, Michael enjoys swimming.
